name: game-jam-toolkit-bundle
description: Complete game jam development partner for Unity 2D projects. Validates starter scripts, guides architecture using modern patterns (Input System, async/await, memory optimization, dependency injection), and generates production-ready features during jam time.

agents.name: jam-architect
agents.description: System design expert for game jam features. Takes feature requirements and produces architecture plans, class diagrams, integration points, and modern Unity patterns (Input System, async/await, dependency injection, pooling).

agents.name: feature-developer
agents.description: Writes complete, production-ready C# scripts for game features. Generates code that matches starter patterns, uses modern practices, handles Input System, async patterns, memory optimization, and integrates seamlessly with existing systems.

agents.name: code-quality
agents.description: Code reviewer focused on jam-time quality. Catches memory leaks, Input System inconsistencies, improper async patterns, pooling issues, and architectural problems without blocking workflow.

commands.name: review-starters
commands.description: Run full validation on your 20 starter scripts. Checks code quality, best practices, integration health, and modern pattern adoption.

commands.name: design-feature
commands.description: Design a new game feature. Provide feature description and get architecture plan, system design, class structure, and integration strategy.

commands.name: generate-feature
commands.description: Generate complete C# scripts for a feature. Takes architecture from /design-feature and produces production-ready code matching your starter patterns.

commands.name: review-code
commands.description: Submit code for instant feedback. Checks against starter patterns, modern practices, memory safety, and architectural consistency.

commands.name: jam-status
commands.description: Quick health check of entire game jam project. Scans code quality, integration issues, best practice compliance, and readiness.
